product_name: NRS Baron 4 Inflatable Stand Up Paddleboard
long_description: Designed for big paddlers that venture into rough waters, the NRS Baron 4 inflatable stand up paddleboard offers rigid stability with a soft touch. Not only does the NRS Big Baron handle like a composite board, but it deflates and offers a compact option for the traveling paddler. High air pressure creates a rigid hull without the use of frame parts; the performance is suited to surf, flatwater and whitewater applications. PVC-coated polyester stands up to heavy use, and a specialized drop stitching and coating process creates a board that can be inflated to 15 psi. 11 ft. 4 in. length turns responsively, making wave cruising easy; 36 in. width offers unusually high stability. Textured and grooved deck padding grips your feet and enhances maneuverability. Removable center fin and 2 side fins promote easy tracking; includes a 9 in. fin, two 5 in. fins and two 2 in. fins. Recessed center webbing strap makes transport easy, and bow and stern webbing handles with D-rings offer a great place to clip accessories. The NRS Baron 4 inflatable stand up paddleboard includes carrying case with shoulder straps, extra fin, K-Pump 100, pressure gauge and a repair kit. 3 webbing handles make it easy to get the Big Baron to and from the water. Uses Leafield C7 valves.
short_description: Designed for big paddlers that venture into rough waters, the NRS Baron 4 inflatable stand up paddleboard offers rigid stability with a soft touch.
